name: Northern Tales 6: Oath to the Gods Collector's Edition
name_original: Northern Tales 6: Oath to the Gods Collector's Edition
description:
Received a task from Odin to close the rift from which the evil creatures escaped, Ragnar descended into the bowels of the mountains. to the kingdom of the dwarves.
Ragnar told them about his mission and the dwarves let him through. As proof, he showed the amuleted gift by Odin himself.
On the way to the rift, Ragnar was in wait for various dangerous.
Finally reaching the rift, Ragnar threw the amulet into the rift, a flash appeared and the evil was sealed. The dwarves wanted to repay Ragnar for his help and arranged a grand feast.
The next morning, Ragnar said goodbye to the leader of the dwarves. Then the dwarves opened an ancient portal that led to the surface.


Key Features:
- 40 diverse, colorful levels
- Redesigned graphics
- Intriguing plot
- Historical background
- Hidden objects
- A variety of game modes
- Dynamic gameplay
- 5 different bonus levels
- Exclusive wallpapers for your desktop
